General.Name: Crazy Coin
General.Description: Crazy Shapes is a Waves blockchain-based 2D platform game with its own universe and story. Both single and multiplayer features are available. Crazy Coin tokens (CZC) allow players to receive in the beginning the in-game currency and bonuses for a fast development of the character. New ways of integrating the tokens into the game will be introduced.

ICO.Description:
Crazy Shapes is a Waves blockchain-based 2D platform game with its own universe and story. Both single and multiplayer features are available. Crazy Coin tokens (CZC) allow players to receive in the beginning the in-game currency and bonuses for a fast development of the character. New ways of integrating the tokens into the game will be introduced.

Team:

  • Victor Dyakov: Project Manager.
  • Denis Podolyak: Main Programmer.
  • Pavel Kapralov: Designer.
  • Artem Grebennikov: PR Manager.

Crazy Shapes will be holding its ICO on November 1, 2017. The ICO token supply represents 70% of the total token supply, so there will be a total of 59500000 tokens available at the offering. The ICO  is expected to end on November 28, 2017.

Token Reserve Split (30%):

  • 2% Bounty Campaign;
  • 1% Presale;
  • 27% Information N/A;

Crazy Shapes ICO campaign will feature Bounty campaign and Bonuses, and the token will not be mineable.

Bonus Structure:

  • 20% Stage 1 (01/11/2017-07/11/2017);
  • 15% Stage 2 (08/11/2017-14/11/2017);
  • 10% Stage 3 (15/11/2017-21/11/2017);
  • 5% Stage 4 (22/11/2017-28/11/2017).
